plays.text: Penalty to Brooks Laich 2 minutes for Tripping Tyson Nash

Goal scored by Dainius Zubrus assisted by Alexander Ovechkin AND Brian Willsie

Goal scored by Matt Bradley assisted by Ben Clymer AND Brooks Laich
Penalty to Nolan Yonkman 2 minutes for Hooking Shane Doan
Penalty to Chris Clark 2 minutes for Elbowing Zbynek Michalek
Penalty to Ladislav Nagy 2 minutes for Tripping Alexander Ovechkin
Goal scored by Alexander Ovechkin assisted by Brendan Witt
Penalty to Mike Ricci 2 minutes for Hooking Ben Clymer
Penalty to Brendan Witt 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
